di

psr/container implementation for humans

View on GitHub

KeyValue из environment

<?php
use Cekta\DI\Container;
use Cekta\DI\Provider\KeyValue;

$providers[] = new KeyValue(getenv());
$container = new Container(... $providers);
echo $container->get('PATH');

  • JSON
  • PHP
  • Custom format
  • LoaderInterface

  • Transform
